A Simple Node Boilerplate

This boilerplate demonstrates a simple, common setup for Node.js / Express 4 applications.

HTML5 Boilerplate

HTML5 Boilerplate uses years worth of learning and best practices to give app developers a good starting point. This repository makes use of some of its interesting features. You're reading an HTML5 article section right now. The section above is an HTML5 article header.
